body:
Yes it's deliberate. We mutate internal state stored in that object.

On Wed, Jun 17, 2015 at 12:33 PM Jorge Canizales notifications@github.com
wrote:

> By deleting this const
> https://github.com/grpc/grpc/blob/master/src/objective-c/GRPCClient/private/GRPCSecureChannel.m#L41.
> Then turn warnings in the GRPCClient library
> https://github.com/grpc/grpc/blob/master/gRPC.podspec#L77 back on.
> 
> @jboeuf https://github.com/jboeuf @ctiller https://github.com/ctiller
> or @nicolasnoble https://github.com/nicolasnoble : Is the non-constness
> of the grpc_credentials argument to grpc_secure_channel_create
> https://github.com/grpc/grpc/blob/master/include/grpc/grpc_security.h#L148
> on purpose?
>
